title: Looking for Duo (Bronze - Silver)
body:
Hey,
I'm a Silver 4 Anivia main, would like to find a duo in either bronze/silver to play some ranked games together. 
Any role would be fine, and the only request would be for the duo to have a good mentality, to not rage/flame teammates when losing.
Add me in the client and PM me if you are interested. My IGN is: flamingsword2
